snippet: The media company reported net income of $20.1 million in the second quarter, compared with a loss of $87.6 million in the period a year earlier.
abstract: New York Times Company reports second-quarter net income of $20.1 million, or 13 cents per share, up from loss of $87.6 million, or 58 cents per share, in same period year earlier; cites stronger circulation revenue and lower operating costs.
lead_paragraph: The media company reported net income of $20.1 million in the second quarter, compared with a loss of $87.6 million in the period a year earlier.

headline.main: New York Times Company Posts a 2nd-Quarter Profit
headline.print_headline: New York Times Company Posts a 2nd-Quarter Profit
